label: 鉾
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: A Japanese spear. Differs from a yari (halberd) in the method of handle attachment. A spearhead has a hollow socket tang that is mounted over its handle's tapered end, while the head of a halberd has a tapered tang that inserts into a vertical hole in the pole. [槍]
